transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello. Haan ji Shivraj ji Abhishek baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.

Customer: Boliye.

Executive: Haan ji, abhi add kar diye sir product saari cheeze?

Customer: Haan ji haan.

Executive: Haan, kaam kar raha hu mai yaha pe.

Executive: Nahi jaise mam se koi baat hui thi, koi teesra number se call aaya tha mere paas WhatsApp pe hai. To kahi to mam se mam agar karwa sake to unse connect kar lete hai sir. Kyuki kya hai na parso shayad aapne mujhe call kiya tha aur kal bhi kal bhi kiya tha parso shaam ko kiya tha wo mujhse miss ho gaya tha sir call. Aur mai call nahi kar paya tha. Hai na to uske regarding concern raise ho gaya sir team se to usko mujhe close karna hai, rest ke liye video meet up.

Customer: Haan.

Customer: Okay, to kya bhi kar lenge ruko.

Executive: To mujhe batao to mam se kab connect karna hai. Jo video product update karwani hai mai karwa deta hu.

Executive: Hang on, mai ek baar check kar leta hu.

Executive: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Okay ruko. Haan sir.

Customer: Boliye.

Executive: Haan ji.

Executive: To mai video meet ki link bhej du dobara product add karwane ke liye? Haan bhej do bhej do.

Executive: Okay okay. Same mail ID aapki hai usi pe bhejna hai?

Customer: Bhej do.

Executive: Theek hai.

Executive: Theek hai dekhiye maine aapko send kiya hai. Same mail ID pe gaya hai aapki. Haan send kar diya abhi aapke mail pe mere naam se aayega Abhishek Singh ke naam se.

Customer: Join with Google Meet hai?

Executive: Ya.

Executive: Yes sir.

Customer: Nisha, hamare paas nahi hai phone.

Customer: Hai aaya?

Customer: Nahi aa raha hai.

Executive: Shivraj sir aapne join laptop se kiya hai na laptop ya system se?

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Achha achha theek hai aap join ho chuke hai na to apna seller panel jara login kijiye tab tak.

Customer: Hai. Aaya idhar Abhishek sorry aaya lekin ye hai bol rahe hai ye.

Executive: Nahi mai hi hu mai join hu. Ye dekhiye sir aawaz aa rahi hai ki nahi meri?

Customer: Haan aawaz aaya. Haan mai join hu.

Executive: Aap usme screen apni share kijiye.

Customer: Haan? Screen.

Customer: Screen mein. Haan.

Executive: To usme aapko bataunga cheeze kaise karni hai aur submit karke bhi dikhaunga. Hai na jisse ki aapko aasani ho aur jaldi se jaldi cheeze ho jaye. Correct na?

Customer: Haan bolo na ki kaise screen kaise share karna hai.

Executive: Achha to laptop se join kiya aapne aapko ek window dikh rahi hogi. Jisme jaise aapka camera aur mic jaha pe likha hota hai na. Waha pe jab aap click karenge uske right side mein camera ke right side mein ek upper side ko arrow bana hoga icon ka. Hai na ispe click karenge to aapko pop up aayega. Right ek chhota sa pop up middle screen mein jisme aapka Chrome tab, window aur entire screen likh ke aayega. Entire screen pe click karenge uske baad ek chhoti si Google Meet.

Customer: Screen screen.

Executive: Show more information.

Executive: Haan nahi aa rahi hai kya sir?

Customer: Nahi aa raha.

Executive: Ek second rukiye ga to mai kaam karta hu. Screenshot bhejunga kaise kaise aayega. Bhej deta.

Customer: Achha achha.

Executive: Aabhi but kya aap mujhe number ek baar receive karenge apna? Number aapka yahi hai na isme aapka show nahi ho raha. 78 double wala.

Customer: Hi bhej raha hu dekho.

Executive: Haan?

Customer: Dekho hi bhej raha hu aapko.

Executive: Okay okay.

Executive: Aaya nahi sir abhi.

Customer: Aapka na phone karo na is number se nahi aayega.

Executive: Achha kya mai number se karna hai? Rukiye rukiye rukiye rukiye rukiye rukiye. Okay rukiye haan.

Executive: Nahi aapka ye number hai na 943776787?

Customer: Haan haan.

Executive: Theek hai.

Executive: Dekho jo screenshot bheja hai usme mark bhi kar deta hu. Ye wala. Dekho niche ye screen share ka option hai. Ye screen share ka option hai. Ispe jab aap click karoge uske mai phone kar raha hu ruko.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs assistance with product update.

- Customer unable to share screen on Google Meet.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to guide through screen sharing.

- Executive sent screenshot with instructions.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Executive to call customer to assist with screen sharing.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product update, screen sharing, google meet
